_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The stages of the Shady Orchid Tree [an7: The leaves on the Shady Orchid Tree belonging to the Gods of the Thirty-Three turn brown
It’s ready to grow flowers and leaves separately
The Shady Orchid Tree has fully blossomed
The stages of a noble disciple going for: Planning to go forth from the lay life to homelessness
Shaving off hair and beard, dressing in ocher robes, and going forth from the lay life to homelessness
Entering and remaining in the first absorption
Entering and remaining in the second absorption
Entering and remaining in the third absorption
Entering and remaining in the fourth absorption
Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
The gods who raise the cry (a causal seq: Gods of the Four Great Kings
Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
